title: These 30 Zara Pieces Will Be the Guaranteed Star of Your Spring and Summer Highlight Reels
description: Shop them before they sell out.
excerpt: Shop them before they sell out.
text: There's no denying that Zara is a one-stop shop for buying chic, trendy pieces no matter the season. Right now, I have my sights set on the current spring and summer collections—They're comprised of a lovely mix of classic, trendy, and even ethereal finds that are right up any fashion person's alley. Best part is the majority are affordable without sacrificing your budget.During my latest perusal, the warm-weather selection was exceptionally good. I'm talking head-turning dresses, cool jeans, gorgeous sandals, pretty tops, and so much more. I highly recommend you scoop up your top picks now because they are most definitely going to sell out. Keep scrolling to shop 30 Zara pieces that will be the guaranteed star of your spring and summer highlight reels. ZARA Split Leather Bowling Bag Standout suede bag alert. ZARA Long Skirt Zw Collection It's officially white skirt season. ZARA Double Strap Lace Ballerinas A cool take on the mesh ballerina trend. ZARA Zw Collection High Waist Wide Leg Jeans This minimalist look is perfect from head-to-toe. ZARA Elongated Woven Shopper Woven bags are a personal favorite. ZARA Zw Collection Lace Satin Effect Top ZARA Linen Blend Straight Pants One of my top linen pants picks. Into this suede and lace mix. ZARA Trf High Rise Wide Leg Jeans ZARA Buttoned Strapless Top I'd wear this with jeans. I know this is going to sell out. Effortless dresses are the best. Suede and a toe-ring? Yes, please. ZARA Plain Knit Wool Cardigan ZARA High Rise Z1975 Straight Leg Jeans A great way to wear white jeans. ZARA Contrast Leather Sneakers Can I please just jump into this scene? ZARA Double Layer Knit Dress Butter-yellow and it looks designer. ZARA Interlock Bandeau Top Endless styling possibilities. ZARA Mini Suede Topstitched Shopper ZARA Leather Kitten Heeled Sandals Major "yes" for white sandals. ZARA Plain Knit Basic Short Sleeve Top Another standout red piece. ZARA Balloon Tulle Combination Dress ZARA Pointelle Top With Satin Bow There's something about pointelle that I can't get enough of.
html:
There's no denying that Zara is a one-stop shop for buying chic, trendy pieces no matter the season. Right now, I have my sights set on the current spring and summer collections—They're comprised of a lovely mix of classic, trendy, and even ethereal finds that are right up any fashion person's alley. Best part is the majority are affordable without sacrificing your budget.

During my latest perusal, the warm-weather selection was exceptionally good. I'm talking head-turning dresses, cool jeans, gorgeous sandals, pretty tops, and so much more. I highly recommend you scoop up your top picks now because they are most definitely going to sell out. Keep scrolling to shop 30 Zara pieces that will be the guaranteed star of your spring and summer highlight reels.

ZARA

Standout suede bag alert.

It's officially white skirt season.

A cool take on the mesh ballerina trend.

This minimalist look is perfect from head-to-toe.
